sentences.en: A nasty incident was prevented by the timely arrival of the police.
sentences.cn: 警察的及时到来阻止了一次严重事故。

sentences.cn: 昨天玩宾戈赢了一把，适时地给朱丽叶·利特尔一家带来些许的欢快心情。

sentences.en: A timely snow promises a good harvest.

sentences.en: So the Island loomed large and timely in Soapy's mind.

sentences.en: This is a timely rain indeed.

sentences.en: We can hardly express our gratitude to you for your timely help.
